metadata.name: Execution Of Non-Existing File
metadata.comment: Checks whether the image specified in a process creation event is not a full, absolute path (caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND NOT contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\')) AND NOT (process.name is null OR lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('-', '') OR (lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('system', 'registry', 'memcompression', 'vmmem')) AND (lower(LOWER(process.cmd_line)) in ('registry', 'memcompression', 'vmmem'))))

output.summary: Checks whether the image specified in a process creation event is not a full, absolute path (caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process)
